FontString.name: $parentannounceOnHoldStr
FontString.text: Announce items held for later roll

FontString.name: $parentlootWhispersStr
FontString.text: Send whispers to loot holder, banker and disenchanter.

FontString.name: $parentcountdownRollsBlockStr
FontString.text: Ignore all rolls done after countdown

FontString.name: $parentscreenReminderStr
FontString.text: ScreenShot reminder before trading an item

FontString.name: $parentignoreStacksStr
FontString.text: Allow trading a stack of an item

FontString.name: $parentOutput
FontString.text: Start typing to see the final message.

Scripts.OnClick: local csv = KRTImportEditBox:GetText() if csv and csv ~= "" then KRT.Reserves:ParseCSV(csv) KRTImportWindow:Hide() end
